content.question: Which of the following printing techniques was used to create The Steerage ?

topic.text: 4.3: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
